input.sentences: the clock tower is a fan favorite .
there were many trees around the campus .
if this tree could speak | it would have many tales to tell .
the pond was beautiful . many wildlife would visit it for a quick swim .
output.sentences: The old clock tower is one of my favorite places on campus.
It is surrounded by old limestone buildings with ivy snaking through the crevices.
There are many old growth trees on campus including a Ginko tree.
In the area central to the quadrangle students deliver political speeches.
If you can it up a small incline you will find yourself beside the college lake.
